created_by.description: The valid Slack user ID of the user who created this Call. When this method is called with a user token, the `created_by` field is optional and defaults to the authed user of the token. Otherwise, the field is required.

date_start.description: Call start time in UTC UNIX timestamp format

desktop_app_join_url.description: When supplied, available Slack clients will attempt to directly launch the 3rd-party Call with this URL.

external_display_id.description: An optional, human-readable ID supplied by the 3rd-party Call provider. If supplied, this ID will be displayed in the Call object.

external_unique_id.description: An ID supplied by the 3rd-party Call provider. It must be unique across all Calls from that service.

join_url.description: The URL required for a client to join the Call.

users.description: The list of users to register as participants in the Call. [Read more on how to specify users here](/apis/calls#users).

schema.description: This method either only returns a brief _OK_ response or a verbose schema is not available for this method.
schema.title: Default success template
